#### Discussion

-   PCA: TLS+ and control tumors largely overlap -\> TLS is not the main driver of variation
-   PCA: clear separation by IDH status -\> Strong impact of IDH mutations on expression
-   TLS+ gliomas show transcriptional differences compared with controls
-   TLS+ samples have higher immune GEP scores -\> More active adaptive immune response
-   Overall, gliomas with TLS display a more active immune microenvironment
